name: eqtr
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wa(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c1, c2)), wceq(c0, c2))

stmt.origin: biimpar(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c1, c2), wceq(c0, c2))
stmt.pretty: biimpar(c0 = c1, c1 = c2, c0 = c2)

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c1, c2)), wceq(c0, c2))
-| wi(wceq(c0, c1), wb(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c1, c2)), wceq(c0, c2))
-| wi(wceq(c0, c1), wb(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c2)))

body.origin: |- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wb(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c2)))

cumulated.origin: |- wi(wa(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c1, c2)), wceq(c0, c2))

comment: Transitive law for class equality. Proposition 4.7(3) of [TakeutiZaring] p. 13. (Contributed by NM, 25-Jan-2004.)
